item.title: 保险公司米兰摩天大楼楼顶的巨型 Generali 横幅倒塌
item.description: 周一，Assicurazioni Generali SpA 公司米兰摩天大楼顶部的巨型横幅部分倒塌，导致当局对该区域进行了清理。【原文：A giant banner perched on top of Assicurazioni Generali SpA’s Milan skyscraper partially collapsed on Monday leading authorities to clear the area.】

item.title: 英国林赛炼油厂业主的母公司陷入破产管理
item.description: 普拉克斯集团（Prax Group —）的母公司--英国林赛炼油厂（Lindsey oil refinery —）--已被接管。【原文：The parent company of the Prax Group — which owns the UK’s Lindsey oil refinery — has been put into administration.】

item.title: 三里岛重启进入快车道，微软获胜
item.description:
美国最大的电网运营商正在加快对核电重启的审查，以帮助蓬勃发展的人工智能产业。【原文：

A review of the nuclear restart is being sped up by the biggest US grid operator to help the booming artificial-intelligence industry.

】

item.title: 中国房屋销售持续低迷，要求加大刺激力度的呼声日益高涨
item.description: 6 月份，中国的房屋销售继续下滑，给经济带来了更大压力，也凸显了采取新的支持措施的动力。【原文：China’s home sales extended their slump in June, putting further strain on the economy and underscoring the impetus for fresh support measures.】

item.title: 中央银行警告：爱尔兰政府必须扩大税基
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行警告说，爱尔兰应扩大税基，以确保其预算能够保护长期财政稳定。【原文：Ireland should broaden its tax base to ensure its budget protects long-term fiscal stability, the Central Bank of Ireland warned.】

item.title: 全球顶级养老基金日本 GPIF 主席获得 20.2 万美元薪酬
item.description: 日本政府养老金投资基金是世界上最大的退休基金之一，该基金表示，其已离职总裁的薪酬在 2024 财年略有增长，达到 3241 万日元（20.2 万美元）。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund, one of the world’s largest retirement funds, said its departed president’s compensation rose slightly in fiscal 2024 to ¥32.41 million ($202,000).】

item.title: 马斯克副手离开特斯拉，留下领导层空白
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，埃德-鲁德洛（Ed Ludlow）将探讨埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和特斯拉（Tesla）在高管离职后面临的挑战。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ed Ludlow looks at the challenge facing Elon Musk and Tesla following the departure of top executives.】

item.title: 沙特 PE 公司 Jadwa 在 PetroApp 首次公开募股前投资 4500 万美元
item.description: 沙特私募股权公司 Jadwa Investment 已承诺向沙特燃料和车队管理公司 PetroApp 投资 4500 万美元，以期在 2028 年之前将该公司上市。【原文：Saudi private equity firm Jadwa Investment has committed $45 million to Saudi fuel and fleet management firm PetroApp, with a view toward taking the company public by 2028.】

item.title: 特朗普的破坏令辛特拉的央行官员感到不安
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们将关注欧洲央行在葡萄牙举行的年度务虚会的一大亮点。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at the big highlight of the European Central Bank’s annual retreat in Portugal. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普第二任期贸易谈判的三大特点
item.description: 随着减税和削减开支法案的通过日益临近，以及暂停最极端关税的 90 天即将到期，未来 10 天有可能成为唐纳德-特朗普总统第二个任期迄今为止影响最大的日子。【原文：With a tax-and-spending cut bill inching closer to passage and a 90-day pause on his most extreme tariffs poised to expire, the next 10 days are setting up to be potentially the most consequential of President Donald Trump’s second term so far.】

item.title: 亚马逊在销售纠纷中失去销售任天堂 Switch 2 的权利
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co.）与亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）在未经授权的销售问题上产生分歧后，将其产品从亚马逊美国网站上撤下，这意味着这家电子商务公司错过了任天堂 Switch 2 的首次亮相；这是有史以来最大的游戏机发布会。【原文：Nintendo Co. pulled its products from Amazon.com Inc.’s US site after a disagreement over unauthorized sales, meaning the e-commerce company missed out on the recent debut of Nintendo’s Switch 2 — the biggest game console launch of all time.】

item.title: 塞内加尔美元债券暴跌，报告引发新的债务担忧
item.description: 新兴市场表现最差的美元债券前景变得更加暗淡。【原文：The outlook for the worst-performing dollar bonds in emerging markets just got a lot bleaker.】

item.title: 瑞士央行实行零利率制度后，瑞士即期存款飙升
item.description: 在瑞士国家银行将借贷成本降至零之后，该行的即期存款大幅增加，因为外国银行将现金转移到该机构，以逃避货币市场的负利息。【原文：Sight deposits at the Swiss National Bank rose sharply after its reduction of borrowing costs to zero, as foreign banks moved cash to the institution to escape negative interest paid in the money market.】

item.title: 据说 Torrent Pharma 将为收购 JB 获得 23 亿美元的信贷额度
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Torrent Pharmaceuticals Ltd. 已从全球银行安排了高达 2,000 亿卢比（23 亿美元）的信贷额度，用于收购 JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Ltd. 的控股权。【原文：Torrent Pharmaceuticals Ltd. has arranged a credit line for as much as 200 billion rupees ($2.3 billion) from global banks toward its acquisition of a controlling stake in JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯认为 4-9 月经济增长 "几乎持平
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，由于围绕全球贸易政策的巨大和 "残酷的不确定性"，欧元区经济正在停滞不前。【原文：The euro-area economy is stalling because of the enormous and “brutal uncertainty” surrounding global trade policy, according to European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 过山车式的上半年即将结束，股价创下历史新高
item.description:
美元暴跌、关税焦虑影响今年上半年市场

item.title: 尽管印尼遭受痛苦，中国仍坚持征收不锈钢税
item.description: 中国将继续对进口不锈钢产品（包括来自印度尼西亚的产品）征收反倾销税，以保护受持续供应过剩和贸易不确定性影响的国内产业。【原文：China will press on with levy anti-dumping duties on imports of stainless-steel products, including from Indonesia, as it seeks to protect a domestic industry battered by persistent oversupply and trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 美联储与特朗普在关税影响问题上的较量即将接受考验
item.description: 经济学家们普遍认为，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策将在未来几个月内显著提高通胀率。但迄今为止，物价上涨乏力，这让人们对这一假设产生了质疑，也让白宫更加胆大妄为，并引发了美联储内部的分歧。【原文：It’s a widely held belief among economists that President Donald Trump’s tariffs will boost inflation notably over the next few months. But muted price increases so far have called that assumption into question, emboldening the White House and opening up divisions at the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 南非卡冈亚戈为降低通胀目标辩护
item.description: 南非储备银行行长莱塞特贾-克加亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）强化了其采用较低通胀目标的论点，他指出，当前的目标损害了兰特，使物价不断走高。【原文：South African Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago reinforced his argument for adopting a lower inflation target, noting that the current goal hurts the rand and allows prices to march higher.】

item.title: 波音公司价值 47 亿美元的 Spirit 飞机交易面临英国反垄断调查
item.description: 英国反垄断监督机构表示，波音公司斥资 47 亿美元收购 Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc.【原文：Boeing Co.’s $4.7 billion deal to buy Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc. will face UK antitrust investigation, the country’s antitrust watchdog said.】

item.title: 新世界完成创纪录的 112 亿美元贷款再融资交易
item.description: 陷入困境的香港建筑商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Distressed Hong Kong builder New World Development Co. has closed a HK$88.2 billion ($11.2 billion) loan refinancing deal, formally concluding months of negotiations with banks for the largest-ever such borrowing in the city.】

item.title: 欧洲央行微调战略以应对世界更频繁的冲击
item.description: 欧洲中央银行公布了对其使用货币政策引导经济的调整，对近期通胀飙升进行了反思，并预计此类冲击今后可能会更频繁地发生。【原文：The European Central Bank unveiled tweaks to how it uses monetary policy to steer the economy, reflecting on the recent spike in inflation and anticipating that such shocks are likely to occur more often in the future.】

item.title: 普华永道任命一批新的香港和中国合伙人以振兴公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，普华永道会计师事务所（PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP）在大中华区任命了 20 多位新的合伙人，因为该事务所在中国最大的房地产开发商倒闭事件中扮演了重要角色，并因此陷入困境。【原文：PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP named more than 20 new partners in Greater China as the firm seeks to reboot its business following the troubles stemming from its role in the collapse of the nation’s biggest property developer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员追逐 S&P 500 指数狂飙，受 "FOMO "驱动的看涨期权买盘飙升
item.description: 在 S&P 500 指数创下 2 月份以来的首个纪录后，交易员们热衷于抓住进一步上涨的机会，他们押注于股市的宠儿，预计它们将超越该指数的涨幅。【原文：Traders keen to seize on further gains after the S&P 500 Index hit its first record since February are betting on stock-market darlings that they expect will surpass the index’s ascent.】

item.title: 坎帕表示，欧洲正在寻求有关银行向 SRT 买家放贷的数据
item.description: 据一位最高监管机构称，欧洲当局正在推动银行向投资者披露更多贷款数据，这些投资者会转而利用这些资金帮助同行卸下信贷风险。【原文：European authorities are pushing banks to disclose more data on loans to investors who turn around and use the funds to help peers offload credit risk, according to a top regulator.】

item.title: 橡树树联席首席执行官帕诺西安看到数据中心繁荣的迹象
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联席首席执行官Armen Panossian表示，大量资金追逐与人工智能相关的投资，正在产生 "过度风险"。【原文：The amount of money chasing investments linked to artificial intelligence is creating the “risk of excesses,” said Armen Panossian, co-Chief Executive Officer at Oaktree Capital Management LP.】

item.title: 意大利通胀率意外稳定在欧洲央行 2% 的目标之下
item.description: 意大利 6 月份通胀率意外保持不变，连续第二个月低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标。【原文：Italian inflation unexpectedly stayed unchanged in June, holding below the European Central Bank’s 2% target for a second month.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师称就业疲软或限制股市上涨空间
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A slowdown in the US job market will weigh on the S&P 500, offsetting any positive impact from the Federal Reserve’s interest rate cuts, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 波兰六年来首次出售绿色债券
item.description: 波兰时隔六年多重返绿色债券市场，为加速能源转型寻求融资支持。【原文：Poland is returning to the green bond market after more than six years as it seeks a financing boost for its accelerating energy transformation.】

item.title: 贝莱德称不可预测的美国政策有利于欧洲信贷发展
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）认为，如果投资者从美国转向欧洲，欧洲固定收益将从中受益，这表明投资者对不可预测的美国政策和不断膨胀的政府债务持谨慎态度。【原文：BlackRock Inc. sees European fixed income benefiting from any investor shift away from the US, signaling caution around unpredictable US policy and ballooning government debt.】
